-- | Nico Nico Douga (ニコニコ動画) Comment Translator

@package nicovideo-translator
@version 0.1.0.0

module NicovideoTranslator.Translate
translate :: ISO639_1 -> Text -> IO Text
translateMultiple :: ISO639_1 -> [Text] -> IO [Text]

module NicovideoTranslator.Proxy
data ProxyConfiguration
ProxyConfiguration :: ISO639_1 -> Text -> ProxyConfiguration
language :: ProxyConfiguration -> ISO639_1
upstreamHost :: ProxyConfiguration -> Text
app :: ProxyConfiguration -> Application
